alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 14 at 12:31AM CDT until August 14 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL OSAGE COUNTY... At 1230 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Shidler to 4 miles west of Wynona to 3 miles northeast of Osage, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Pawhuska... Sunset Lake... Nelagoney... Pershing... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
